description: Provide comprehensive marketing analytics and AI-powered insights by integrating Singular data with your tools. Generate detailed campaign reports, perform cohort and LTV analysis, and build natural language reports to optimize marketing performance. Access real-time data and advanced metrics seamlessly through an intuitive interface.

singularApiKey.description: Your Singular API key from https://app.singular.net/

capabilities.name: test_connection
capabilities.description: Test the connection to Singular API with detailed diagnostics including metric hash discovery

capabilities.name: diagnose_account
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive account information including available data ranges, apps, and permissions

capabilities.name: create_campaign_report
capabilities.description: Create a comprehensive campaign performance report. Responds quickly and may require a follow-up.

capabilities.name: get_report_data
capabilities.description: Retrieves the data for a report that was already started and is taking a long time to generate.

capabilities.name: analyze_campaign_performance
capabilities.description: AI-powered campaign performance analysis with actionable insights. Uses MCP sampling for intelligent analysis when available, with structured fallback for compatibility.

capabilities.name: smart_report_builder
capabilities.description: AI-powered report builder that intelligently selects dimensions and metrics based on natural language descriptions. Automatically discovers and uses cohort metric hashes for advanced analysis when available.

capabilities.name: create_cohort_report
capabilities.description: Create advanced cohort analysis report with LTV metrics, using hashed cohort metrics and specific periods like 'actual'. Responds quickly and may require a follow-up.

capabilities.name: analyze_campaign_ltv
capabilities.description: AI-powered campaign LTV and ROI analysis with optimization recommendations. Uses MCP sampling for advanced insights when available, with structured analysis fallback.

capabilities.name: get_metric_data
capabilities.description: Natural language metric data retrieval. Handles requests like 'give me revenue details', 'show user retention', 'get session data', etc. Automatically discovers and uses the correct metric hashes.
